title: Love Again
writer: Jim Strouse, Sofie Cramer, Andrea Willson
short_cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Sam Heughan, Céline Dion, Sofia Barclay, Russell Tovey, Lydia West, Steve Oram, Omid Djalili, Nick Jonas, Celia Imrie, Arinzé Kene
cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Sam Heughan, Céline Dion, Sofia Barclay, Russell Tovey, Lydia West, Steve Oram, Omid Djalili, Nick Jonas, Celia Imrie, Arinzé Kene

desc: Still grieving her fiance's death, an artist texts her deepest thoughts to his phone and forms a bond with the man who receives them by chance.
